SPLOSNITEKST: Basic data about people involved in research. We have analysed gender, age, place of residence, favourite music genre and music listening time per day.
RAZPOLOZENJEINBARVETEKST: Connections between moods and colours which can be filtered by different properties.
GLASBAINRAZPOLOZENJE: Visualization of music and mood in music
GLASBAINRAZPOLOZENJETEKST: People's rating of colour and mood in music - mood which music arouse and mood perceived in music.
